programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 2
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Justine's Flavors Of Fuji - EP 2
programme.desc: In an area filled with an extraordinary amount of tradition and culture, Justine meets local artisans and producers, visits amazing places and learns time-honoured cooking methods. Under the watchful eye of Fuji-san Justine will share dishes inspired by the journey and the produce that makes Shizuoka such a unique place... in such a unique country. Along the way Justine will learn the secrets to making soba noodles, Japanese sweets known as Wagashi and authentic soy sauce.

They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 317
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)(重)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

She secretly follows him and almost collides into a motorbike midway. The fierce-looking car owner, Da Bing, wanted to hit her but thankfully, Dong Yu, an air-conditioner technician, appears to save her, leaving a deep impression on Miao Miao. (PG)(重)私召车司机淼淼怀疑儿子贵强与George关系暧昧，暗自跟踪，途中差点与一摩托车相撞，车主大炳凶神恶煞，要对淼淼不利，幸好冷气维修员东宇出面解救，令淼淼对他留下深刻印象。.

programme.title: 家和万事兴 Lee's Family Reunion - EP 240
programme.desc: (R) Passed down from generation to generation, the Li Ji Cake Shop has a hundred-year history to boast about. However, though the Li family look happy on the outside, there are conflicts aplenty behind closed doors. (PG)(重)《李记饼铺》代代相传已有百年，看似幸福美满的三代同堂，其实暗潮汹涌。老太爷李万世育有二子，长子再传留在饼店里帮忙，私生子再兴则流落在外，生活潦倒。主演：黄少褀饰高天诚，六月饰陈慧心，韩瑜饰李正男，方文琳饰罗秀琴。.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 104
programme.desc: (R) Ke Ai looks for Shun Shui, and tries her best to calm him down, telling him that mistakes are bound to occur and it is only wise to learn from them. (PG)(重)可爱找到顺水，好言相劝，顺水说118亏钱都是他一意孤行的错，可爱指犯错是成功之路，只要从错误中学习，还是会有成功的一天。至于达明对他的指责虽然严厉，但也不无道理，就当是当头棒喝，顺水却仍然闹别扭。.

programme.title: 小鲤鱼历险记 The Adv Of Little Carp - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) The beautiful Carps Lake suffers the scourge of the evil snake. The small Carp Pao Pao was forced to swim out of his desolate homeland in search of the power of the dragon. He makes the acquaintances of the cowardly two-sided turtle, the arrogant A Ku and the delicate Mei Mei. (重)美丽的鲤鱼湖遭受了癞皮蛇的祸害，小鲤鱼泡泡被迫游出凄凉的家乡，寻找龙的力量。他先后结识了胆小的双面龟，傲气的阿酷，娇柔的美美。.

programme.title: 三个愿望 Three Wishes - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Yaozong suddenly loses all his memory since he was 10 years old and forgets about Shanmei and his children. Everyone knows that this is the price to pay for a wish and Shanmei reveals the secret of the last wish. No matter who uses the last wishing coin, the price is Yaozong's death and the last wishing coin is nowhere to be found. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)耀宗突然失去了10岁以后的记忆，把善美和孩子们都忘了，大家心知这是许愿后付出的代价，善美也说出了最后一个愿望的秘密。原来不管谁用了最后一个愿望钱币，代价是耀宗会死，而最后一个愿望钱币已经不见。.

programme.title: 银色嘉年华 Silver Carnival - EP 2
programme.desc: Famous rogue lawyer Josephus Tan and his mother will share their experiences in life with us. Classics from Jacky Cheung, Jenny Tseng, Qi Qin and Jiang Hu bring you back to 90s memories. Healthy food will not be boring Chef Cao Yong will share yummy Cantonese dishes while Chinese physician Guo Mei Ling will teach you home remedies for itchy skin (pruritus). 一道料理,一段人生故事,著名的流氓律师陈俊良和妈妈在成长道路上经历了哪些酸甜苦辣 张学友,甄妮,齐秦, 姜鄠,那些90年代的流行金曲又会换起你哪些沉睡的记忆呢无论是曹勇师傅带来的80年代传统粤菜还是郭美伶医师的食疗方,一定都能让你吃出健康,尽享美味!

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 365
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) On the deadline for the submission of the En Bloc proposal, Wei Ren's computer breaks down unexpectedly. Wei Ren bumps into Ting Xuan when he is on his way to fix the computer. Ting Xuan recommends him an expert to fix it and he manages to submit the proposal in time. Wei Ren notices Ting Xuan's strengths. He changes his impression towards her, which improves their relationship. (PG)(重)为人在截止日期当天，做完集体销售计划书，不料电脑突然坏了。他十万火急赶着去修电脑，遇到庭萱。庭萱介绍一位超级厉害的电脑专家帮他修好电脑，让他及时交上计划书。为人看到庭萱的优点，对她改观，两人关系改善。.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 7
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 白色强人 Big White Duel - EP 9
programme.desc: (Part 1) Tang Ming performs surgery for Zhongxue in private. He notices that the cancer has spread to Zhongxue's spine, leaving him no choice but to stop the surgery. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(第9集上)仲学病情恶化，唐明决定私下为他动手术，却发现他的癌细胞已扩散至脊椎，被迫终止手术。.

programme.title: 超级同学会 Super Reunion - EP 4
programme.desc: 《超级同学会》由从华视入学的“佼佼”黄子佼、“阿亮”卜学亮领军，将召开一场场充满欢笑、泪水、惊喜的同学会，对演艺圈如数家珍的两位大学长，将号召综艺王国、戏剧界以及音乐圈的同学们，为您献上经典男团女团、动人金曲、好久不见的大牌巨星，还有势必将再造另一股风潮的经典游戏 !

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 4
programme.desc: Mandy hears from her daughter, Xie Ying, that her boyfriend, Justin, is earning fast money through virtual currency investment. Mandy then decides to invest five thousand dollars to test waters and indeed earns a few thousand dollars. She then increases her investment to fifty thousand dollars and takes Xie Ying to shopping, buying branded shoes again so that people will not look down on her. (PG)Mandy从女儿谢颖处得知其男友Justin投资虚拟货币，短时间内就赚了钱。Mandy心动，决定拿出5千元投资试温度，果然短期内就赚了几千元，她于是加大投资，投入5万元，还和谢颖出门开心购物，为了不让人看不起，又花巨款买下名牌高跟鞋。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 焦点 Focus - EP 2
programme.desc: Focus provides timely reports and analyses on international news and current affairs from Singapore's perspective. 《焦点》追踪国际时事，实地报道区域课题，以新加坡的视角分析时局发展的前因后果和潜在影响。.

programme.title: 巨轮II Brother's Keeper S2 - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Kailin is embarrassed when she learned that Weixin overheard her confessing her feelings about him. Guo Bao snatches Zhongying's necklace to clear his debt, they have a tiff.Nana is happy when Weixin texts her that he is coming to Okinawa. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)当凯琳坦言对威信有好感时，被站在背后的威信听到，凯琳感到尴尬。国宝被文泰追债至走投无路，再向钟颖拿钱，更出手抢其钻石链，钟颖离家向先柏哭诉.收到威信将要来冲绳岛的简讯，娜娜心暗欢喜。.

programme.title: 蜀山战纪之剑侠传奇 The Legend Of S - EP 45
programme.desc: (R) Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (PG)(重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 邻里合作社 United Neighbours Society - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) In each episode, we will zoom in on a residential estate where our two rival artistes will pit against each other to garner help from the residents to form their own "dream team". Each team will then embark on the task of decorating a 8 to 10 feet tall structure into an art piece within a given time. The winning art piece will then be decided by votes from MPs, arts professionals, as well as residents staying nearby. (重)两名主持人，各自找来一名〝达邻〞，帮忙在该区寻找10名组屋居民加入队伍。每队要在限时内以各种材料装饰一尊大型雕像。每集的雕像不一样，但都是一些可以代表新加坡的标志／物件，如狮子、椰树和胡姬花等。比赛结束后，该区居民、议员和美术专家们会进行投票，选出优胜队伍。节目宗旨：希望透过节目提倡睦邻精神、种族和谐及社区凝聚力，促进邻里彼此互动与了解。.

programme.title: 陆游与唐琬 Lu You And Tang Wan
programme.desc: 诗人陆游年轻时娶表妹诗名卓著的“苏门四学士"之一晁补之的孙女唐琬为妻。夫妻二人诗书唱和，感情深厚。但因陆母不喜唐琬，恐误其儿前程，威逼二人各自另行嫁娶。在陆游百般劝谏、哀求而无效的情势下，二人终于被迫分离，唐琬改嫁赵士程，彼此音息隔绝无闻。.

programme.title: 欢喜没烦恼 Happy-Go-Lucky - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) As Singapore progresses to become a smart nation, the folks at Happy Street strive to upgrade themselves to catch up with the times. They move out of Happy Street this week for some self-upgrading classes. On the other hand, Hong Kong actor Kenneth Chan brings the crew to a senior activity centre where he finds a 68-year-old lady. She is not only a lion dance troupe member but also a Cantonese opera singer! (重)随着我国快速成为智慧国，欢喜街的大大小小都紧跟时代步伐，不断自我提升。这个星期，欢喜街的街坊到外头上课，很是热闹。说到热闹，久违的香港艺人陈启泰也拉队来到香港的一个乐龄活动中心，听说他在这里找到一位68岁的大姐，能舞狮头，又会唱越剧！.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 105

programme.title: 新成龙历险记2 All New Jackie Chan Adventures S2 - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Professor Chaos is a villain who creates capsule monsters out of children's bad habits and uses them to turn dreams into nightmares. The brave, smart and kind guardians of J-Team, Jackie, Amy and Duangduang, must stand up against Professor Chaos and his evil plan by stopping all his evil creations and protect children from the nightmares! (重)乱来教授是一名恶棍，他根据孩子的坏习惯制造胶囊怪物，用它们将梦想变成噩梦。 J-Team的杰克 ,小美和铛铛是勇敢，聪明和善良的梦境守护者。他们阻止乱来教授的邪恶创作并保护孩子免受噩梦，对抗乱来教授和他的邪恶计划！.

programme.title: 健康那些事 全民来防疫 Get Fit with Me - Overcome COVID-19 - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Let's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial. (重)运动 (Exercise) 即使需要减少群体活动，自己一人同样能运动！运动达人们传授各种适合乐龄人士的运动，教大家不断 keep fit 强身健体。.

programme.title: 三个愿望 Three Wishes - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Shanmei and Yaozong's wedding anniversary arrives. To celebrate Yaozong's reacceptance of Shanmei, Yaozong's father arranges for them to go out to have fun. Shanmei accompanies Yaozong for a day and ends up under a tree by the beach, a place where the two used to date often. Strange images start to flash through Yaozong's mind and his head starts to hurt badly. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)善美与耀宗的结婚周年到了。为了让耀宗重新接受善美，宗父安排两人结伴外出玩乐。善美陪耀宗玩了一整天，最后回到两人经常约会的海边大树下。不料耀宗脑海竟闪现一些奇怪画面，头剧烈疼痛起来。.

programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺 Golden Age Talentime - EP 2
programme.desc: A popular singing competition which provides the elderly with a platform to showcase their singing talent. 这个深受乐龄人士欢迎的歌唱比赛为爱唱歌的乐龄朋友提供了演出的平台。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 366
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 9

Wei Ren has Yan Xun's support and hence is confident that his company will win. However, Yan Xun does not cast his crucial vote to Wei Ren, which results in Wei Ren losing the deal. Wei Ren is shocked and feels betrayed. (PG)(重)为人与对手公司在会议上做讲解，争取成为美好苑代理销售商。由于有彦勋的支持，为人信心满满，有把握自己的公司会获选，不料合约却被另一家公司获得。为人得知彦勋把关键性的一票投给对手公司，不禁愕然，感觉自己遭到背叛。.

(PG)(双声道-中/韩)崔德培成功说服英玉担任他公司的登记理事。英玉一盖章，崔德培就卷款潜逃，导致英玉成为债主们讨债的对象。接下来，世娜成功引导英玉用正韩的印鉴在文件上盖章，导致正韩被YB检举挪用公款。相民为了救正韩，决定出售土地。.

programme.title: 身在异乡非异客 Strangers At Home - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) This week, we explore those with Southeast Asian roots in Taiwan. Since the arrival of the Burmese Chinese in the 1950s, and the influx of Southeast Asian labourers in the 1990s, interracial marriages have flourished. Yet, they remain viewed as "foreigners". How have they tried to assimilate? (重)最先来到台湾的东南亚群体，是50年代移居台湾的缅甸华人。在90年代，台湾人开始大量雇用东南亚劳工和帮佣，同时台湾男性娶东南亚配偶的人数也越来越多。自此，东南亚群体便在台湾落脚、生根。虽然近年来政府投注大量资源援助新住民和二代适应社会，但内心深处，台湾社会对于这些所谓的“新台湾人”，总是怀着抗拒的心态。即使在台湾生活了许多年，这些新住民二代混血儿、外籍配偶、缅甸华人，还是被贴上了“外来的”标签。为了融入主流社会，他们付出多少努力？.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) From creatively-styled dishes to simple delights found in Taiwan, Host Danny Yeo explores delectable food inspired by the works of four notable Taiwanese authors. (重)从气派十足的创意料理到朴实恬淡的家常小菜，这一趟台湾之旅，主持人杨君伟透过四位作家的笔触，探索台湾的暖心美食，品尝透过味蕾触发内心情感的飨宴。.

(PG)(双声道-中/韩)佳英在正韩出国当天发现自己怀孕了。佳英联络不到正韩，于是想前往机场拦截正韩，却被世娜推下楼梯。几个月后佳英挺着肚子到尹家，哀求英玉告诉她正韩的下落，英玉却说不会承认佳英肚子里的孩子，要佳英不要找正韩。.

programme.title: Luar Biasa
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Luar Biasa is based on the story of Paralympic gold medalist, Mohamad Ridzuan, or better known as Dek Wan, who suffers from Cerebral Palsy. He was diagnosed with his illness weeks after he was born. This however has caused him to lose all his strength to talk, balance to walk and a drastic change to his physical body as compare to other kids. Due to his inabilities, Dek Wan has only his brother Saiful to depend on as a sibling and good friend. No matter what happens. programme.desc: Angered by Borhan's decision in choosing Farouk to replace his position, Zack leaves Akademi Waris. Ryan welcomed Zack's decision with open arms, but Sofea is not pleased. She has strong suspicions of Ryan's bad intentions. Ryan is pressured to pay up his debt to an underworld gangster. Zack is unaware of Ryan's illegal betting activities. Turns out, the mysterious stalker is all along an accomplice in Ryan's mission to create discord between Zack and Borhan.

programme.title: Medic Kid - EP 1
programme.desc: Medic Kid is a 3D animated series that is fully comedy, family oriented an educational. It's a story about a boy with his imaginary alter-ego as the Medic Kid will learn the wonderful world of medical science and share the knowledge to combat disease and germ monster metaphor. The story sets place not just in the physical world, but also in a microscopic level within the internal organs of the human body.

programme.title: Makan Xtrim - EP 4
programme.desc: Host: Nurul AiniWe normally use sauces as condiments or to marinate our food. How will our tasters react when faced with Wasabi, Cincalok, Tamarind Sauce and Thai Fish Sauce? Will they gag non-stop and lose their appetite for the whole day? Let's find out with our host, Nurul Aini, in this week's saucy episode.

programme.title: Suamiku Mr Blind - EP 15
programme.desc: Ain receives a letter of acceptance to further her studies. However, she is willing to forgo her dreams for Aidil. She gets a shock when he informs her to remain in Malaysia as he leaves for London by himself in the airport.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 9
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Kembara Kasih - EP 2
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Dalina heads over to land of a thousand temples, where karma is believed to be the cause of medical conditions and defects like cleft lip or cataract. Yet, these conditions can be easily corrected with surgery. Together with John Fawcett Foundation, and her fellow Malay volunteer, Izzat, Dalina sets out to convince villagers to accept medical treatment despite their beliefs that this is god's punishment. She witnesses a young couple make the tough decision to allow their infant to undergo cleft lip surgery, and a grown man who requests for cleft lip surgery despite having lived with it for nearly thirty years. Dalina also organises a game session for a young cleft palate patient to encourage her to open up and make friends.

programme.title: Poskad Dari Alhambra - EP 7
programme.desc: Amy realizes Jose is more interested in Sara. She shares her misadventures with Khairul, realizing they are both losers in love. Strange brusies start appearing on Sara's body, could she be having a relapse from past illness?

programme.title: Jula Juli Bintang Putus Cinta
programme.desc: In this sequal, both Jula and Juli are happily working at Hotel Ombak Villa. Everything seems to be going in the right direction for the pair. Things take a turn when Izham's mother insist that Juli, as her future daughter-in-law, learns the art of cooking.To impress her future mother-in-law, Juli learns how to cook from her colleagues but her efforts are belittled. This leaves Juli humiliated and she decides to end her relationship with Izham.

programme.title: Jula Juli Bintang Putus Cinta
programme.desc: In this sequal, both Jula and Juli are happily working at Hotel Ombak Villa. Everything seems to be going in the right direction for the pair. Things take a turn when Izham's mother insist that Juli, as her future daughter-in-law, learns the art of cooking.To impress her future mother-in-law, Juli learns how to cook from her colleagues but her efforts are belittled. programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 9
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Ketawa Jer - EP 1
programme.desc: New-bies :The residents of Blok 5 welcome a new resident of the community. But not everyone is as welcoming. Some are cautious of their Jiran Baru.

programme.title: Konti Karat - EP 7
programme.desc: Host: Shuib SepahtuKonti Karat is a multi-format programme that combine a talkshow and singing in one programme. The invited celebrities will be interviewed by host Shuib and they will then share their personal belongings to selected audience that can sing karaoke in the studio. With the concept of bringing conty to TV, it's going to present new evolution and unique programming.

programme.title: Anak Syurga
programme.desc: Ikmal starts to neglect Adam after he found out that he has autism. His marriage was on the rock until he met Pak Sahak whom he send home after his motorcycle breaks down on the side of the road. Ikmal is surprised to see both Pak Sahak's children ar handicapped. He realised his mistakes and feel aggrieved for what he has done to Adam.

programme.title: Suria Elektra 2020
programme.desc: Celebrates Suria's 20th birthday with an explosive celebration filled with electrifying stars and dynamic performances. The celebratory soiree underlines milestones and achievements that have not only shaped the Malay entertainment industry locally but contributes to the growth of the regional entertainment. With a myriad of iconic performers, a kaleidoscope of visual and lighting feasts and the vibrant presence of local stars, Suria Elektra will be the gala jamboree of 2020.

programme.title: Ayuh Sihat Bersama! (Get Fit With Me - Overcome COVID-19) - EP 6
programme.desc: Host: Shahril WahidOvercome COVID-19 by staying healthy together. Hosted by Shahril Wahid, this specially produced 5 episode series will share exercises to build immunity and strengthen muscles as well as healthy recipes. Hear from our doctors on important information on COVID-19 and how to overcome it.

programme.title: Jodoh Tak Salah Alamat
programme.desc: Luqman met Diana when she accidentally crashed his car some time ago. He hates her then. But he is surprised to know that Diana is going to be his soulmate.

programme.title: Medic Kid - EP 2
programme.desc: In this episode, Singville Primary School celebrates a special day.What can that special day be?But something unpleasant happens during the event. Can Danish save the day?Can he protect his friends from the evil germs and foil GermBos plan?Danish and friends will also learn about healthy eating habits and unhealthy food.

programme.title: Top 5 Makan - EP 12
programme.desc: Host: Dayana RozaTop 5 Makan lists out the best places to eat in Klang Valley - from Burgers and Seafood to Western and Nasi Lemak. Hosted by Dayana Roza, this show will showcase different great versions of a dish there can be. Celebrate the best of its kind and see how your favourite dishes are given a unique twist.

programme.title: Suamiku Mr Blind - EP 16
programme.desc: Six months have passed and Ain is now working as a trainee teacher. She lives in a house with her friend, Wahida. Puan Ainon feels worried that something bad might have happened to Ain as Ain has not contacted her for the past six months. Aidil returns from London and has now regain his sight.

programme.title: Berita 2020-2021 - EP 10

programme.title: Kelab Prefect - EP 5
programme.desc: Kael accused Adam of stealing money from a jumble sale and Firaz and Luq fought with Kael. Adam tried to persuade his friends to change their attitude. Farah is running out of money as it is difficult to get a new job and Sofia refuses to lend her money. Adam gets scolded by Mr Lim again.

programme.title: Lesen Besar
programme.desc: Mark, Mus and Zain are three old friends who used to be close but grew apart as they focussed on their careers and romantic relationships. When an invitation for a wedding in Singapore came their way, they see an opportunity not only to catch up, but to also have some fun by turning it into a road trip. However, luck is not on their side.

programme.title: Biz Malaysia
programme.desc: Dapatkan maklumat-maklumat semasa dan terkini mengenai ekonomi Malaysia dalam Biz Malaysia.

programme.title: Dimensi Cergas
programme.desc: Tonton teknik-teknik meningkatkan kecergasan seperti latihan kecergasan rintangan tinggi dan Senaman Tabata dalam dimensi cergas.

programme.title: Refleksi Aktif
programme.desc: Episod pertama memberi tumpuan kepada bagaimana program mengenal pasti bakat melalui proses pemilihan, penilaian, pencarian dan penyelidikan tentang bakat sukan seseorang individu dilaksanakan dengan bantuan sains sukan.

programme.title: Smart Parents
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan motivasi TV yang akan membincangkan tentang tips ibu-bapa bijak anak hebat. Episod kali ini membincangkan topik 'Biar Hidup Tak Kaya Asalkan Keluarga Sentiasa Bahagia' bersama hos Zaid Mohamad.

programme.title: Bakul Telur Emas
programme.desc: Bakul Telur Emas pada minggu ini membincangkan tentang topik Abang Pencen Bergaya bersama pakar perunding kewangan.

programme.title: Rencah Hidup
programme.desc: Bersama pengacara, Nadia Hasnan menelusuri kisah keinsafan daripada insan yang pernah melakukan jenayah dan kesalahan dalam episod Rencah Hidup.

programme.title: Hijau Dot Com
programme.desc: Hijau Dot Com memaparkan tentang penggunaan sumber alam semula jadi, pengurusan hijau berteraskan konsep mesra alam dan potensi sisa menjadi bahan baharu.

programme.title: Al Mulki Nusantara
programme.desc: Kembali ke masa lampau dan saksikan kehebatan kerajaan Melayu lama seperti Melaka, Acheh dan Pasai di seluruh Nusantara dalam episod Al-Mulki Nusantara.

programme.title: Doktor Pokok
programme.desc: Hos Doktor Pokok, Heliza Helmi akan berkongsi tentang penyakit tanaman pelihara dan teknik mencegah dan merawat penyakit pokok.

programme.title: Cina Muslim Malaysia
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Iswan Ismail, episod kali ini memaparkan keunikan makanan cina muslim malaysia. Antara tetamu episod ini ialah Haji Sharin Low (Pemilik Restoran), Cindymysara Hoo (Peniaga), Huiming Teoh (Pekerja Restoran) dan Aman Teoh (Chef).

programme.title: Psikosis
programme.desc: Psikosis adalah sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah, pengalaman dan rawatan tentang pelbagai penyakit mental bersama hos Aiman Amri. Psikosis pada minggu ini memaparkan mengenai Sindrom Kurang Daya Tumpuan dan Hiperaktif (ADHD).

programme.title: Denai Warisan
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang dihoskan oleh Zarif Kamil menjelajah serta mengkaji tempat bersejarah ketika zaman penjajahan di Tanah Melayu.

programme.title: Casa Betesda
programme.desc: Eric and John hang out at Casa Betesda Orphanage before flying to Chile to shred buckets of fresh powder. The brothers arrive in Nicaragua, where they find some beautiful surf and hang out at Casa Betesda Orphanage. After helping paint rooms and school the groms with some skate tips, they jump on a flight to Chile to shred some ridiculous snow.

programme.title: End of the Road
programme.desc: After an unexpected disaster befalls both brothers in Chile, the rest of the journey is suddenly in jeopardy. A moment of miscalculation in Chile winds up sending both John and Eric to the hospital and puts the rest of the journey in peril. Ian Walsh stays behind to surf a big swell while he awaits word from the brothers on whether or not they can continue.

programme.title: Bouncing Cats
programme.sub-title: The story of Breakdance Project Uganda
programme.desc: A Ugandan AIDS orphan works to empower his community's children through exposure to B-Boy dance culture. AIDS orphan Abraham 'Abramz' Tekya works to empower, rehabilitate and heal the children of Uganda through his free workshop that teaches young people about hip-hop, B-Bboy culture and breaking.

programme.title: Dubrovnik to Mostar
programme.desc: Explore the countries – and their skate spots – involved in the Yugoslavian war of independence. Brian Delatorre, Cyrus Bennett, Simon Stricker, Alex Davis and Andrew Wilson are on a mission to explore the countries involved in the 1991 Yugoslavian war of independence. A ruined hotel in Dubrovnik is their first skate spot.

programme.title: Sarajevo and Belgrade
programme.desc: Cyrus Bennett, Brian Delatorre, Alex Davis, Andrew Wilson and Vladik Scholz head to Sarajevo and Belgrade. Cyrus Bennett, Brian Delatorre, Alex Davis, Andrew Wilson and Vladik Scholz head to Sarajevo, capital of Bosnia and Herzegovina, and Belgrade, capital of Serbia, on the last two stops of their Balkan tour.

programme.title: La Dura Dura
programme.desc: A legendary sport climber and the young phenom hot on his heels team up to send the world's hardest route. Chris Sharma has been at the top of the sport climbing game for 15 years, but 19-year-old prodigy Adam Ondra is hot on his heels. The legend and the young contender team up in Catalunya, Spain, trying to establish the world's hardest route.

programme.title: Race for The Nose
programme.desc: A rivalry for the speed record up The Nose of El Capitan, California, USA pushes climbers to their limits. For a decade, Hans Florine and Dean Potter have one-upped each other in a wild race for the speed record up The Nose, a 3,000ft route on El Capitan in California, USA, each taking increasingly enormous risks to reclaim the title.

programme.title: Wyandotte’s BMX highlights
programme.desc: Tyler Fernengel gives us a tour of his favourite BMX spots in his hometown of Wyandotte, outside Detroit. Tyler Fernengel gives us a tour of his favourite BMX spots in his hometown of Wyandotte, outside Detroit. From the streets of the Motor City to the indoor Transitions Skatepark, Tyler shreds the spots that made him the BMX star he is today.

programme.title: BMXing in Chicago and Denver
programme.desc: BMXer Tyler Fernengel makes a couple of stops on his way to his new home in San Diego. After a heartfelt goodbye to family and friends, Tyler Fernengel hits the road for his new home in San Diego. Along the way, he stops in Chicago for a BMX session with Brian Kachinsky, and Denver, where Mother Nature is less than welcoming.

programme.title: Welcome to San Diego
programme.desc: After a visit to Salt Lake City, Tyler Fernengel meets his new pro BMX buddies for a session in San Diego. Tyler Fernengel swings through Salt Lake City on his drive west before pushing on to San Diego. When he arrives, he meets up with fellow BMX pros Dennis Enarson and Chad Kerley to see for himself how the sessions really go down in his new town.

programme.title: The Cool Kid
programme.desc: Nintendo and Sega squared off against each other in the '90s, both attempting to corner the video game market. While the race to claim market share between Sega and Nintendo was a tight one, the Sega system had access to an FM synth, which introduced new sound possibilities. With it, Yuzo Koshiro produced the masterful Streets of Rage soundtrack.

programme.title: The Role of Role Play
programme.desc: Japanese role-playing games are responsible for some of the most iconic melodies in video game history. The drama and emotion in Japanese role-playing games have inspired some of the most iconic melodies in video game history. As a result, Nobuo Uematsu’s melodies from Final Fantasy have transcended video games, appearing in orchestral renditions.

programme.title: Traveleyes
programme.desc: Traveleyes pairs sighted and blind travellers to share the adventure of a lifetime. Through organised trips with sighted guides, Traveleyes is helping blind people discover places that were once off limits. Traveleyes pairs sighted and blind travellers to share an adventure together.

programme.title: Into the Light
programme.desc: Climber Chris Sharma attempts to climb from the bottom of the huge Majlis al Jinn cavern back to the surface. Majlis al Jinn, a huge subterranean chamber in Oman, is big enough to house the Great Pyramid of Giza. Climbers Chris Sharma and Stefan Glowacz attempt an ascent up the massive arch and back to the light of the surface.

programme.title: Rising to the challenge
programme.desc: S1 E2 – With the pressure on, singers and producers are paired up to create a brand-new track. S1 E2 – Songwriters Grace Savage, Shay D and Harley Nixon get randomly paired up with producers K1R3Y, Razor and A Class in the second round as they work together to create an original track.

programme.title: Nepal
programme.desc: Rob Warner and downhill pro Olly Wilkins ride around the world's tallest mountain range. Rob Warner and downhill pro Olly Wilkins ride around the world's tallest mountain range, starting at the foothills of the Himalayas in Nepal.

programme.title: The Flying Crusaders
programme.desc: The introduction of the celebratory finish-line whip manoeuvre opened the doors to a new form of motocross. In the late 1990s, the finish-line whip began as a way to show off after winning a motocross race, but this stylish trick soon opened the floodgates to a new form of self-expression which inspired a global tour – freestyle motocross.

programme.title: They see us rolling
programme.desc: Jamie and the crew go for a tow ride along the shallow river and maybe a little tow along the sand too. Jamie and the crew go for a tow ride along the shallow river, and maybe a little tow along the sand too. Then they get rolling down the hill in giant inflatable balls.

programme.title: From white water to big waves
programme.desc: Can these big wave surfers handle white water rafting over a waterfall? Jamie and the crew try white water rafting over the world's highest commercially rafted waterfall. Can these big wave surfers handle the rapids?

programme.title: Choose your instrument wisely
programme.desc: S1 E4 – The top three teams of songwriters and music producers have one more challenge before they can claim victory. S1 E4 – After creating an original track with their new partners, the top three teams of songwriters and music producers have one more challenge to face before they get a chance to land a publishing deal.
